hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that bombing the hole Volvagia last flew into can be rewarding.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Serenade of Water# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #an Ice Cavern Compass# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Bolero of Fire#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #4# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #the Tower#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #1# major item.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #House of Twins#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Song of Time#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: Where did Anju meet her lover?^${12 39 C7}At a Kafei.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #1# major item.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Poacher's Saw# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: Fingers-Mazda, the first thief in the world, stole fire from the gods.^But he was unable to fence it.&It was too hot.&He got really burned on that deal.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Nocturne of Shadow# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Song of Time#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Market#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #the Prelude of Light#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Temple of Time# chimes with the music of #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Bolero of Fire#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: BRRING BRRING This is Ulrira. Wrong number?
